name: io.github.cyanheads/pubmed-mcp-server
description: Comprehensive PubMed MCP Server to search, retrieve, and analyze biomedical literature from NCBI.

environment_variables.name: MCP_TRANSPORT_TYPE
environment_variables.description: Specifies the transport mechanism for the server.

environment_variables.name: MCP_LOG_LEVEL
environment_variables.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').

environment_variables.name: NCBI_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Your NCBI API key for higher rate limits.

environment_variables.name: MCP_TRANSPORT_TYPE
environment_variables.description: Specifies the transport mechanism for the server.

environment_variables.name: MCP_HTTP_HOST
environment_variables.description: The host for the HTTP server.

environment_variables.name: MCP_HTTP_PORT
environment_variables.description: The port for the HTTP server.

environment_variables.name: MCP_HTTP_ENDPOINT_PATH
environment_variables.description: The endpoint path for MCP requests.

environment_variables.name: NCBI_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Your NCBI API key for higher rate limits.
